meanings.sent1: The dilative balloon grew bigger as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent2: The sponge soaked up the water and became dilative.
meanings.sent3: The dilative rubber band stretched so much, it reached the other side of the room!
meanings.sent4: Her dilative imagination allowed her to dream big and create amazing stories.
meanings.sent5: The dilative clouds filled the sky, creating a beautiful sunset.

meanings.definition: Capable of being dilated or expanded
meanings.sent1: The dilative material could be stretched to fit any size.
meanings.sent2: The dilative fabric allowed for easy adjustments to the dress.
meanings.sent3: The dilative suitcase surprisingly fit all her belongings for the trip.
meanings.sent4: His dilative mind could grasp complex concepts and ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dilative rubber gloves expanded to accommodate different hand sizes.
